cyclone.name: FERNAND
cyclone.current_location: about 90 miles SE of La Pesca, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the northeastern Mexican coast, remaining well south of the Texas coastline
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near La Pesca, Tamaulipas, Mexico (northeastern Mexico coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch/warning limited to Mexican coast – Puerto Altamira to the mouth of the Rio Grande River
weather_observation.warning_coast: Same as watch area: Puerto Altamira to the mouth of the Rio Grande River (Mexico)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northeastern Mexico coast and, to a lesser extent, the lower Texas coast south of Corpus Christi
weather_observation.wind: Outer rain bands may bring brief gusts to 35-40 mph; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely at Corpus Christi
weather_observation.storm_surge: None anticipated along the Corpus Christi area
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of heavy rain totalling 2–4 inches possible, mainly Wednesday into Thursday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated, brief tornado threat mainly over far South Texas – very low risk for Corpus Christi
